channel.title: Projects on Kashan Abdullah
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Kashan Abdullah

item.title: Project 1: Classification Using Transfer Learning
item.description: Diverse Image Classification: Developed a deep learning model to classify 100k images of sandals, shoes, and boots using transfer learning. Transfer Learning Expertise: Leveraged pre-trained convolutional neural networks for efficient feature extraction and fine-tuning. Data Augmentation: Applied data augmentation techniques to enhance model generalization and improve classification accuracy. Hyperparameter Optimization: Experimented with various hyperparameters to fine-tune the model’s performance. Robust Evaluation: Evaluated the model’s accuracy, precision, recall, and F1-score on a dedicated test set.

item.title: Project 2: License Plate detection
item.description: License Plate Detection using OpenCV and EasyOCR Detect and recognize license plates from images using OpenCV and EasyOCR libraries. Efficient license plate localization and character extraction. Real-world applications include toll collection, parking management, and law enforcement. Link to Github repository
